_sText:
***CHANGES MADE TO V3***
- Trap nr 1 changed.
- Spawn rate of the barrels in the second trap reduced and will no longer cause severe fps lagg to people without super computers.
- Map optimized more.
- Added damage filter for FALL damage only
- Song nade removed.
- Another sprite trail nade added.
- The last "event" before the map is completed by the CT's have been COMPLETELY revamped - much, much easier.
- The BHOP ending have been completely revamped too, and multi jumps on platform have been added for the deathrun servers without a easy bhop plugin (also i've tested the bhop with the absolute worst settings, it is very possible to complete!)
- Some textures changed.
- This map is no longer in beta, this is the third release and there is no game breaking bugs, no excessive lag creating areas, no broken traps, no unintended stuff pretty much!
I hope you enjoy, feedback is always welcome!

************************************************************************

Deathrun Solar.
17 traps.
5 Special nades.
4 endings.
5 minute timer to complete the map before everything blows to shit.
40 Ct spawns, 3 T's.

Traps -
1. Noob filter in the start
2. Barrel target practise
3. Slippy stairs
4. Rifle zone.
5. Unsafe floor.
6. Very unsafe floor.
7. Spikes.
8. Big jump.
9. Meteor rain.
10. Angry ice stars.
11. Spinning thing.
12. Icy ice
13. Angry baby
14. Lightning
15-17. Randomly chosen sacrifise platforms.

Endings - 
1. Survival.
2. Bhop.
3. Speed Knife.
4. Rope jump.

Nades - 
1. Music Nade.
2. Camera Nade.
3. Sprite/Fire Nade.
4. Sprite/Fire Nade.
5. Very special super nade, in a room locked with a secret 7 digit code. Noclip protection <3

"Armageddon" timer
You got 5 minutes to complete the map before everyone dies in a hellish inferno. (This is still under developpment, currently there will just be a shake and a insta gib on everyone on the map, except if you are on the endings.)


FIXES - 
-Teleportation from the second "fire" nade
-No more avoiding beeing teleported if you fly faar enough after the 1th trap.
-Reduced the number of barrels in the template of the first trap.
-Completely remade the design of the floor.
-Added a Secret room accessable with a 7 digit code, there are hints around the map.
-Remade & fixed the icy area
-Reduced the speed in "Speed knife" and added some weapons around.
-other minor bug fixes.



|oG| Sεrz
